<button onclick="showScore()" style="margin-right: 1em;">Show Answers</button>
<button onclick="refreshPage()">Restart</button>


<script>
function checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer) {
    const span = input.nextElementSibling;
    if (input.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correctAnswer.toLowerCase()) {
        span.textContent = "✓ Correct";
        span.style.color = "green";
    } else {
        span.textContent = "";
    }
}

function showScore() {
    let score = 0;
    document.querySelectorAll('input[type="text"]').forEach(el => {
        const correct = el.getAttribute('oninput')?.match(/'([^']+)'/)?.[1];
        const span = el.nextElementSibling;
        if (el.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correct?.toLowerCase()) {
            score++;
            span.textContent = "✓ Correct";
            span.style.color = "green";
        } else {
            span.textContent = `Réponse : ${correct || ''}`;
            span.style.color = "blue";
        }
    });
    let resultMsg = `Votre score : ${score}/55.`;
    if (score > 35) {
        resultMsg += " Félicitations ! Vous avez un niveau B1 en français.";
    }
    alert(resultMsg);
}

function refreshPage() {
    location.reload();
}
</script>

<button onclick="showScore()" style="margin-right: 1em;">Afficher les réponses</button>
<button onclick="refreshPage()">Recommencer</button>

<script>
function checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer) {
    const span = input.nextElementSibling;
    if (input.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correctAnswer.toLowerCase()) {
        span.textContent = "✓ Correct";
        span.style.color = "green";
    } else {
        span.textContent = "";
    }
}

function showScore() {
    let score = 0;
    document.querySelectorAll('input[type="text"]').forEach(el => {
        const correct = el.getAttribute('oninput')?.match(/'([^']+)'/)?.[1];
        const span = el.nextElementSibling;
        if (el.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correct?.toLowerCase()) {
            score++;
            span.textContent = "✓ Correct";
            span.style.color = "green";
        } else {
            span.textContent = `Réponse : ${correct || ''}`;
            span.style.color = "blue";
        }
    });
    let resultMsg = `Votre score : ${score}/55.`;
    if (score > 35) {
        resultMsg += " Félicitations ! Vous avez un niveau B1 en français.";
    }
    alert(resultMsg);
}

function refreshPage() {
    location.reload();
}
</script>
